1112.content:
Over the next month, Haley felt like she was living the dream.

She'd wake up past ten once everyone had left the house for work and school, made two lots of hot pockets for breakfast and to graze on during the morning (although they were beginning to satisfy her hunger less and less) and then park herself on the couch and watch reality tv shows for most of the day, only getting up for toilet breaks, lunch and snacks.

Sometimes, she didn't even get dressed.

The only thing she was missing was her cell phone, which her mother had taken off her as punishment. The first few days had been torture, but she'd slowly gotten used to not having it. She did miss talking to her friends, and she really missed Dylan, who she hadn't seen since she was grounded.

Once everyone got home, Haley would retreat to her room, a tub of ice cream and bags of snacks in arm and not come down until everyone else had gone to bed. Then she'd eat the leftovers from dinner and be asleep by 2am.

Haley's bad habits were slowly taking their toll on her figure as well, though not too badly just yet.

Her clothes were slowly starting to pinch her thicker skin, her stomach starting to fill out from the over indulgence and turn into a small pot belly. Haley was so used to being able to eat anything she wanted (even though she'd tended to stay away from fattening foods), but her body wasn't used to her new routine and lack of exertion.

Haley didn't really wear a bra these days either, although she had noticed her boobs had grown a little and was happy with the results, but she seemed unaware as to the effects on the rest of her body.

After six weeks of clearing out the Dunphy cupboards, Claire had had enough.

"Get dressed." Claire ordered, throwing open Haley's door one Saturday afternoon. "You're helping me do the food shop today."

Haley groaned from under her dirty, stained covers - it was way too early for her to get up!

Claire's nose wrinkled in disgust from the smell of the room. "You have ten minutes. And you're cleaning this room when we get back."

"Grrnnhh" Haley moaned into her pillow. She heaved herself up out of bed, knowing not to mess with her mother.

*******

Although she took twenty minutes, not ten, Haley did make it downstairs looking relatively presentably.

Since this was her first time out of the house since she'd been grounded, Haley wanted to look her best - unfortunately her 'best' meant now-too-tight clothing that made it looked like she'd gained 20 or 30lbs. With every step, Haley had to adjust her outfit, but at least her boobs looked good, even if they were trying to break free from her bra.

Claire looked wide-eyed at her daughter - this was the first time she (or any of the Dunphy clan) had really got a good look at Haley since she'd been kicked out of school. She made a mental note to grab some bigger clothes and bras for her daughter while they were out.

11121.content:
Claire put the four bags of new (and bigger) clothes and bras in the trunk while Haley sat in the passenger seat, yet again adjusting her pants as they dug into her softer middle.

She hadn't protested when her mother had suggested getting bigger clothes, using the excuse of hormones when Haley asked why they needed to be a size up. Haley didn't notice Claire had added in a few pieces that were 10's and L's in there.

Although Claire hoped her daughter's habits would slowly subside, she wanted a few options that would avoid a meltdown.

With their trip to the mall done, Claire and Haley headed to the grocery store. What Claire didn't realize was just how bad Haley's bad habits and become, and that they were about to get a lot worse.

Initially, the shop hadn't been too bad - they'd stuck to Claire's shopping list as Haley wandered aimlessly after her mother, trying to distract herself from the hunger that was brewing up inside her. They'd grabbed a bite to eat at the mall as a treat: both of them getting a burger and fries, but Haley getting a cookies n cream shake.

Unfortunately, the meal hadn't been enough and Haley's stomach was starting to grumble.

They were about halfway through the list when the smell of fresh pastries caught Haley's attention.

"Mom, I'm bored. Can I have $10?" Haley whined.

Claire rolled her eyes in annoyance. "Why do you need $10?"

"I spotted an arcade machine when we came in that I wanna try." She lied, "At least I can't get in the way over there."

Her mother sighed and handed over the cash. "Fine. I'll meet you in the frozen section in fifteen minutes."

Haley smiled and skipped off to the baked goods section as Claire made her way over to the pantry items.

*****

Haley sat at one of the tables in the baked good area, devouring her box of warm, creamy donut holes when she spotted Dylan walking in...holding hands with her best friend Krysta.

At first, Haley thought she was seeing double, but then Dylan bent down and placed a delicate kiss on Krysta's lips, cupping her face.

Haley popped the last donut in her mouth, wiped the frosting from her lips with the back of her hand and stormed over to them, angrily chewing as she went.

"What the hell guys?!" Haley shrieked, taking them both by surprise.

Dylan looked around the store sheepishly, while Krysta surveyed her former friend, noticing her bloated tummy sticking out of the too tight top she was wearing.

"Look Haley. You dropped out of school and no one heard from you. You can't expect Dylan to wait around for you to call. Did you get stuck in your pantry or something? He has needs, y'know." Krysta remarked, smirking as she nodded at Haley's tight clothes.

Haley went red and tried to readjust her top again. Unfortunately the donut holes had done her no favors. "So I've put on a little weight, so what?" Haley bluffed, not wanting to believe the truth just yet. She turned to Dylan, who was starting at her middle.

"Is that true...you and Krysta?"

Dylan snapped out of his haze when Krysta nudged him in the side. He nodded silently as Krysta took his hand again. "...Yeah. Sorry Hales."

Haley's eyes began to water, and she ran off to find her mom.

*****

Luckily, Claire had just made it to the frozen food aisle when Haley rounded the corner, bags of junk food in hand. Haley dumped them in the cart before Claire could say a word, and then made her way over to the tubs of ice cream, grabbing half a dozen one-by-one as she ranted.

"That bitch!" She fumed. "She knew how much I loved Dylan..."

Tears were streaming down her face as she placed another mint-choc chip tub in the cart, followed by a tub of salted caramel.

Confused, Claire was about to ask Haley what she was talking about when Krysta and Dylan came down the aisle, smiling while Dylan had his arm around her shoulder. She thought it best to not say anything and instead took Haley to the check out, abandoning the last few items on the list as Haley added more and more snacks to the trolley.

Claire would let her have today, and the rest of the week to mourn the loss of her first love, then she'd have to get a job before it was too late.

111211.content:
As soon as they'd got home, Haley had headed upstairs with two bags of junk food while Claire unpacked the rest of the car.

Alex and Luke gave their mother a puzzled look when she entered the kitchen, but she chose to ignore it as she put the groceries away, even when her two youngest children narrowed their eyes at the five large tubs of ice cream Claire took to the freezer in their pantry.

"Don't. Dylan just broke up with your sister - let her mourn her first lost love okay?" Claire told them, hands on her hips and a stern look on her face.

"Does she realize she's let herself go?" Alex mumbled.

Claire sighed. "No, I don't think she has. She'll bounce back with a vengeance after she's got over Dylan though, I'm sure."

The blonde started folding her bags, hoping she was right.

*******

One week passed, and then another and Haley didn't snap out of it.

In the first six weeks (before the incident at the grocery store) she'd put on about twenty pounds, but it only took her two weeks to put on another fifteen, bringing her from 95lbs to a chunky 132lbs and because of her small frame, the gain was clearly noticeable at this point.

Not that Haley had noticed, or would care at this point. She only left her bed to go to the bathroom or to get more food to binge on.

Claire and Phil were worried about their daughter, and even Alex and Luke wished their sister was back to her annoying self.

Phil softly knocked at his daughter's door, a tray of chocolate chip pancakes and an iced coffee in his arms. "Sweetie, you missed breakfast so I brought it up to you."

There was no reply from the other side. Phil sighed and set the tray down outside the door like he'd done every morning for the last fourteen days and headed back downstairs to leave for work.

Once she heard the door close for the final time that morning, Haley slowly got out of bed, groaning with every movement as she shuffled over to the door.

She stopped as she passed the full length mirror on her bathroom door, catching a glimpse of her reflection for the first time in at least a few days and turned to survey her ever-expanding body.

Her eyes were immediately drawn to the pot belly that stuck out between the too tight underwear and one of her mother's old maternity shirts. A few days ago Claire had left a box of old clothes outside of her daughter's door from when she'd been pregnant. She hoped her daughter wouldn't need them, and although they weren't snug yet they were sure to be soon if Haley didn't stop letting herself go like she was.

Haley prodded the foreign mass at her middle, watching her finger go in a few inches each time out of curiosity. It had been harder last night after her last binge of double stuffed oreos, a tub of birthday cake ice cream and two packets of chips. She stood to the side to have a good look at her own girth and bit her lip - she looked like she was pregnant (not too far along) but she knew the only thing inside her would be a food baby.

Her thighs were wider and mottled with cellulite, starting at the hips she never knew she had and filling out her jiggly butt. With every step, she watched a wave of fat ripple across her body, and the weirdest thing was that she wasn't disgusted by it. She felt a small thrill at how her body moved, and was happy to see that her breasts had finally filled out, even if they were just pockets of fat on her chest that -with thanks to gravity- were starting to droop towards her belly.

The smile that grew on her face highlighted her chubbier cheeks and second chin; Haley had always had a baby face, but nothing like what it was now. Her weight gain had given her a more womanly figure. She felt...sexy.

Haley snapped out of it when her tummy gurgled. Thanks to all her binges, her stomach had stretched so much that she'd wake up every few hours starving.

Opening the door, she say the stack of four pancakes and knowing that wouldn't be enough to satiate her needs, she headed down to the kitchen to see what else she could scavenge. Her luck was in, there were leftovers from dinner last night: half a dish of mac n cheese with crispy bacon and a few slices of cold pizza (she ignored the steamed veg that was also left over - she only ate greens if they were drenched in dairy or carbs).

She grabbed the dish and pizza along with another few bags of chips and a gallon tub of ice cream.

Haley piled everything on the bed and dug in, alternating between pizza, pancakes and pasta while she gave the ice cream time to soften. Twenty minutes later, she lay on her sheets, her stomach a rock hard dome that was sticking out of her now perfect-fitting tee. She tried to get comfy but her underwear was digging into her skin.

Tossing side to side, shuffling around and trying to readjust them but it was no use. She struggled to get them off, becoming breathless from the heavy weight of her middle as she ungracefully shimmied out of the small piece of material. Once she finally got them off she tossed them on a pile of undone laundry and pulled the box of maternity clothes closer to her bed, winding herself as she flipped onto her side to find a pair of bottoms.

As she slides them up, the baggy material giving her legs some room to breathe. If I carry on like this, Haley thinks, stroking the sliver of exposed skin where the pants end and the shirt begin, I'm going to need a whole her wardrobe.

1112111.content:
For the first time every, Haley poured all her energy into researching weight gain and everything related to it.

She watched videos of girls showing their gains, read fictional weight gain stories and read advice columns on how to gain weight, all while munching on the last of the snacks in the house as she hatched a plan. Haley knew she couldn't hide in her room forever, and food was filling the void of losing Dylan and being kicked out of school.

Her plan was to get a job relating to food, whether it be fast food, ice cream parlor or bakery. With more of a sweet tooth, combined with the fact there was a chance of getting a lot of food to binge on at the end of the day, she was hoping to get a job in the latter.

Slowly but surely, she tried to get her life back on track: she showered, tidied her room, did her laundry (all at the disbelief of Claire) and applied for any food-related jobs she could, all while subtly getting rid of the clothes she was never planning to fit into again.

Part of Haley's new routine was checking her body every morning when she got up, tracking every new dimple and tracing over every new stretchmark. When she could, she would track her weight gain, rewarding herself for every pound gained by treating herself to more food.

Her family pretended not to notice her weight gain, all while trying to limit the junk food whenever she was around.

It didn't take long for Haley to land the job she wanted: a local bakery called Geogie's were after someone to man the cash register and -when quiet- help out baking in the back. She worked six days a week for around six hours a day, doing the late shift and binging on the leftovers in her car before the drive home. It was everything Haley wanted.

There were a few bumps along the road: Claire confronted Haley about her lifestyle when she hit 175lbs six months after the incident with Dylan. At this point her mottled thighs rubbed together with every step as she was slowly starting to move to a waddle. Her hips had widened, starting to knock into doorways and furniture as she adjusted to her new girth, including her jiggly but and leading to her large, heavy belly. Her belly stuck out a good few inches, hanging over pants and skirts and starting to cover her underwear as it hung down lower with every pound gained.

She now had at least two love handles either side, with a third pair making an appearance when she held herself in certain ways, and while her breasts had become sizable cushions of fat on her chest, she still wished they were bigger. Her face did show some of the most damage though, with her neck having disappeared into a double chin before she'd even started at the bakery. Her cheeks had puffed out, and spots had appeared on her once-flawless skin with her new diet, but Haley loved her new girth, as did one of her coworkers at the bakery.

"You need to go on a diet." Her mother stated one day when she caught Haley wolfing down her eighth cream-filled donut hole in the car after she'd got home from work.
Haley didn't even look her mother in the eyes. "I'm finally happy again, and you can't take that away from me."
Claire stood there at the car door speechless for a moment, before huffing and replying with "You're never going to find someone if you eat like you do and don't have a social life." before she walked off back into the house.

Haley smiled, knowing just how wrong her mother was.

Marc was the owner's nephew and creative mind behind a lot of the delicious bakes at Georgie's. He was tall, with the build of a high school footballer that was more on the bench than on the field with a slight, soft tummy that just popped out over the top of his slightly snug jeans. He'd thought Haley was beautiful from the moment Georgie had introduced them on her first day.

It hadn't taken him long to notice Haley's habits and growing frame, and something about her slowly expanding in front of his eyes turned him on so to help feed his own desires, he'd make Haley special calorie-laden treats before kissing her one night while they were closing up. A few days later Haley admitted to Marc between make out sessions that she was intentionally gaining weight. That night, he helped stuff her until she was fit to burst with sweet treats in the staff room.

The next time he stuffed her was at his apartment, before they had sex for the first time.

Soon enough, both Haley and Marc's weight's soared with Haley reaching 200lbs only a month after Claire had confronted her. That's when her mother gave her an ultimatum: quit your job, lose Marc and go on a diet or move out.

Her pink potbelly bulged out from under her red flannel shirt, putting pressure on the top button of her pants, while her burgeoning muffin top swelled over her waistband.

Her tits also flopped with her stride, making it one of the worst,(and weirdest.) runs she could imagine. She decided to give up and just run the way back to her house. But while she was jogging, her painted on pants finally gave way, causing her jiggling mass to fall. Alex quickly got up again, and scurried away, her freed ass shaking with every labored step. With her half naked, doughy body on display, Alex nearly had a heart attack until she finally ran up the steps of her house, quivering suggestively the entirety of the way.

1221.content:
While most of the student body at Greendale Community College were fast asleep, Annie Edison did not have that pleasure.
Annie had been tossing and turning all night long thinking about how she was going to solve her current situation.

What situation is causing Annie all these problems?
1221.title: insecurity/ nervous about something.

choices: Annie decides to start a speed eaters club.
Annie decides to start a cooking club.
12213.content:
“Can you believe it? Annie Kim has cornered the market on every club I have tried to start!” Annie ranted on between bites of her burger. “Did you know she even started “The Future Screamers of America”, Garrett’s the only member, but still how did she come up with that?” She fumed grabbing a hand full of fries. “Someone pass me the ketchup!”

“Slow down there kiddo, just take a breath and think about this. Is this really something important enough to be stressing about?” Jeff chimed in.

“Yes Jeff, yes it is!” Annie stated after a gulp of soda. “If I don’t get more extra curriculars under my belt how am I supposed to get into my school of choice, huh Jeff?” Annie huffed adjusting her skirt. “Someone pass me the mustard!”

“I just think you need to relax a bit, and maybe take a few more bites of your food before you end up in the “6 feet under club”, am I right?” He said slightly laughing at his own bad joke.

“Hmmmm food, ehhh?” Annie mumbled thoughtfully. “That’s one club idea Annie Kim hasn’t started yet.......” Annie thought to herself while lathering her fries in ranch.

“I wonder what she’s thinking about.” Troy whispered to Abed. “I wonder how Greendale can afford such a wide variety of condiments.” Abed whispered back.
12213.title: She is being outshined by another star student.

choices: Annie decides to kick up her efforts and power through this by herself.
Annie looks for help from a more experienced professional.
122131.content:
“Gastrointestinal Giants.... That’s the name you’re going with?” Jeff asked bluntly staring at the poster Annie had just pinned to the bulletin board. “Yeah Jeff what’s the problem with that it is eye catching, strong, fantastic word play.” Annie said smugly admiring her ad. “Whatever floats your boat kiddo.... Do you know even the first thing about speed eating?” Jeff asked hoping to nip this ridiculous idea in the bud. “It can’t be that hard Jeff, you just stuff food in your mouth and move your jaw extremely quickly, not exactly rocket science.” Annie said dismissing Jeff’s skepticism. “Whatever you say princess” He mumbled.

“Ooohhh, what’s this now, it looks like little Annie Edison is stealing another one of my club ideas?” Annie Kim chimed in appearing behind the two.

“I’m sorry what?” Annie asked sarcastically “This was my idea first, see it was the first on the bulletin board.” She continued.

“Well then I assume you would have no problem with some friendly competition then would you?” Annie Kim asked with false sincerity. “I think our two clubs should compete in an eating competition just to see which one of us is truly the superior club leader, let’s say in a month from now?”

“You’re On, Goldie Hawn!” Annie shouted back not really thinking.

“Good it’s a date then. Tooodles.” Annie Kim said cheerfully skipping off.

“Jeff..... What exactly did I just agree to...?”


***LATER THAT DAY***

“Ok Annie Edison, Chef Barnes here has made 20 delicious hotdogs fresh from the microwave. Let’s see how many you can handle in 10 minutes.” Abed announced in his best reality TV voice.

“Is the contestant ready?” Abed said while looking over to Annie nodding.

“Then begin!”

Annie went at those hotdogs with the passion of a thousand bears knowing that she needed to start intensive training if she wanted to insure her victory against Kim. At first it seemed easy, as she assumed, but by her 6th hotdog she was already beginning to slow down. By her 9th she had to adjust her skirt lower in order to make room for her now bloated belly, and soon after that her time was up.

“TIME!”

“Let’s see how our contestant did!” Abed continued opening an envelope with a blank paper inside. “11 Hotdogs! A new Edison record! Let’s give her a round of applause everyone!” Abed exclaimed with robotic clapping. “Ok, I’m bored now” He said wandering off to his room leaving Annie stranded in her chair unable to move due to fullness.


“I’m never going to beat Kim at this rate, I need to come up with a new plan” Annie thought to herself while massaging her groaning stomach.
122131.title: Gastrointestinal Giants

choices: The Innagural Meeting of the Gastrointestinal Giants
1221311.content:
Though she had only been at Annies locker for a few seconds, Britta deduced from her passive-aggressive slinging of books and assignments that things weren't going to plan...

"Soo...", Britta began, attempting to ease the tension, but the next second the locker had slammed shut in dramatic fashion as Annie turned to her with pursed lips and an intense stare. "Okay, you have that 'I can't find my pen' look again. Should I be worried?"

Annie exhaled, and taking in the situation, leaned in to whisper, "She has Neil."

"Who?"

"Neil!" She hissed, and when Britta continued to look puzzled, she added , "Fat Neil. How am I supposed to compete with that?"

"I mean, you don't have to compete at all, there's more important things to-"

"This is important," Annie retorted, "and if I back out now she would know that I can't compete, and that's not going to happen."

Annie looked up to Britta with a look as tough as she could muster, though it was clear from the way she bit her bottom lip that she was feeling out of her depth.

"Alright, listen - if it's that important I'll help you out. What do we need to do?"

Annie spirits seemed to shift instantly at this offer, and a newfound look of determination took over.

"Recruitment is the most crucial step, so we need to try and get as much of Greendale as we can into Gastrointestinal Giants."

"Great idea, why don't we round up everyone that has joined already and we'll get a word of mouth campaign to..." Britta trailed off as she noticed Annie, crestfallen. "Wait. Has anyone joined yet?"

Annie looked to the floor, and when she returned her gaze to Britta, her patented Disney look was on full form, she shook her head slowly and then returned to shoegazing. Britta felt instantly sympathetic.

"Hey hey hey, it's okay! Look, I'll join, and then you'll have your first member."

"Really?" Annie looked up, vigor returning to her spirits.

"Absolutely. We'll do this thing, don't worry."

But Annie had opened her locker in a flash, reaching in and withdrawing a large notebook. She scrawled Brittas name quickly, but neatly into the ledger with a pink pen and then turned away from the tome.

"The first official meeting is tonight, 7:00 PM in our Study Room - I was going to go alone but this is much more productive."

She closed the book and returned it to her locker.

"See you then - and thanks!"
1221311.title: Annie's competitive flare is challenged

choices: The next day, a rivalry is renewed
12213111.content:
Britta didn't know exactly what to expect, but she should have known that Annie Edison would have gone above and beyond.
The table of the Study Hall had been taken over with graphs, charts and papers that had been organized into two piles, a stylized banner hung over the table - it was if a party was expected, and from the ammount of Hot Dogs at the far end of the table, it didn't look too far off.

Annies eyes lit up as Britta entered the Study Hall with her bookbag slung over her shoulder, she took a second to shuffle the pages until they were just so, and then the meeting began.

"We'll both track eachother with stop watches," Annie began, placing the device into Brittas hand. "We'll start in ten minute increments, and then we'll go from there. Any questions?"

Britta thought for a second, and then pointed to the hot dogs, "Are we just eating hot dogs?"

"For tonight at least; once we're finished training we'll move onto other things."

"Sounds good, Elijah Wood."

Annie slid a plate of hot dogs to her side of the table, she closed her eyes and exhaled slowly, opening them only to connect with Brittas.

"Ready?"

Britta lifted the stopwatch and waved it nonchalantly.

"Alright, three... two... one... GO!"

***

Annie dug into her plate like she was possessed, in lightning speed she had managed to stuff the first hog dog into her mouth as she chewed ravenously. Within the next ten seconds she had already brought the second hot dog to her lips, and ate with equal frenzy.
Across the table, Britta was impressed at her speed with just a minute having passed since Annie had begun, but predictably she began to slow down within the next minute.
Stiffling a burp on the sixth hot dog, Annie's chewing started to slow, as she began to develop a slightly glazed over look in her eyes.

"I don't want to sound like Alien Ant Farm... but Annie, are you okay?"

Annie nodded with half-closed lids, stiffling a second burp as she prepared to finish off hot dog number eight.

At just six minutes, Annie had managed to clear off nine hot dogs, and Britta was convinced that at least three of them were being stored in her exaggerated chipmunk cheeks.

"If you want to stop now, we totally can..." Britta offered as Annie struggled to swallow her 10th hotdog, "I don't think Annie Kim would have been able to eat that many..."

And at the mention of Annie Kims name, the brunette had become reinvigorated with the speed and intensity that she had started with, becoming lost in a spur of jealousy and a competitive nature that had never been challenged. Annie swallowed her 11th hot dog while stuffing in the 12th into her mouth like it were a sausage link, and this too was followed by another directly after.

Britta was shocked, turning her attention back to the stopwatch, the LED display was nearly finished at 9:34.

"Another, like, thirty seconds Annie!"

Hearing this Annie crammed the final two hot dogs into her mouth, struggling to get them both down before her time ran out.

Wincing in pain, she swallowed fiercy and just as she had done so Britta called "Time!" and surveyed the damage.

Leaning back in her chair, Annie breathed deeply, a sharp pain in her stomach preventing her from getting into a comfortable position.

"Holy... Annie, you had..." Britta recounted the number under her breath, "Fourteen hot dogs in 10 minutes!"

Annie could only exhale deeply in response, her wandering hands massaging her extremely bloated stomach.

"That has to be a record or something..." Britta mused as she wrote the number underneath Annies column.

"I... urp... hope so..." Annie's eyes were shut in faux-meditation, trying to blot out the deep pain coming from her protesting stomach.


****

The Meeting officially ended at 7:36 PM but the two remained in the Study Hall until 8:12 - while Britta tried to keep pace with Annie, it just couldn't be done and as the timer rang out she had eaten an admirable yet less impressive 7 and a half. Rising to her feet, Annie clutched her stomach as though she were pregnant, and from the looks of things, that wasn't completely out of the question.

"Are you sure you're feeling okay?

"Mhm..." Annie winced, "This is what victory tastes like."

"Like hot dogs."

"Yeah I definitely taste hog dogs."
12213111.title: The Innagural Meeting of the Gastrointestinal G...

choices: Annie's Full of Spite and Just Plain Full
122131111.content:
While much of the previous night was spent feeling as though she were about to explore - Annie Edison entered Greendale with a jump in her step, confident that she had managed to finally best Annie Kim at her own game.

Unfortunately the hop, skip and jump ended squarely at the bulletin board where a new orange ribbon had been placed over Annie Kim's poster - it read "Fat Dog for Midterms - 24 Dogs in 20 Minutes"

"Impressive isn't it, Edison?" A voice called out, Annie didn't have to turn around to know who it belonged to, but she did anyways.

Annie Kim was beaming, reaching out to adjust the ribbon. "It's a Greendale record you know."

Annie could feel the seething hate welling up inside of her, but before she could speak, Kim was already leaving with a parting, "Neil and I are planning on doing even better next week, should be something!"

***

Annie was still staring at the ribbon after five minutes had passed, and was only snapped out of her trance when a hand tapped on her shoulder.

"Annie?"

The familiar intensity flared up in Annies eyes as they met Brittas.

"Tonight, we're beating this. Together."
122131111.title: The next day, a rivalry is renewed

1221311111.content:
"Come on Britta! One more! One more!"

Annie chanted as Britta struggled to swallow the 9th hot dog, this time she had volunteered to go first.

Britta thrust her hands into the air as she gulped and exhaled deelpy, the stopwatch beeping all the while.
"That's really good," Annie beamed, "We'll have the new record for sure this time..."

Annie prepared herself a plate while Britta grabbed the notebook and scrawled in the number 9. She paused when she noticed a column to the right.

"Hey Annie, what's R.F.I?"

"Room for improvement" She answered, not taking her eyes off of her hot dogs. "If you want to be the best at something you need to set goals. Ready?"

Britta refocused on the stopwatch and readied it, counting down Annie who then dug into her plate like she was starving.

***

"Fifteen!" Britta called out after the 10 minutes had passed.

"And a *urp* half..." Annie reponded groggily.

"And a half." Britta confirmed, writing down the new number into the book.

"I can't wait to see the look on her face," Annie exclaimed with glee as she rose to her feet, "Even if it's just by half, we still beat her..."
Annie struggled with the zipper on her pants, buckling over to undo it - after a breathy sigh of relief, Annies round stomach puffed out beyond the confining 'V' that could do nothing to stop it.

Britta closed the book and rose to her feet as well, a dull pain in her stomach a reminder to the massive meal she had eaten as well.


Annie could hardly sleep knowing that tomorrow Annie Kim would be the one to admit defeat.
1221311111.title: Annie's Full of Spite and Just Plain Full

choices: Britta is full and fed up
12213111111.content:
"Troy and Abed in the Mooorning"

Annie awoke with a start, hearing her roomates shuffling about their shared apartment. She wasn't meant to be awake just yet, but thought it a waste to try going back to bed. Sitting on the edge of the mattress, yawning as she prepared herself for the day ahead - then smiled extra wide when she thought of Annie Kims reaction to her stunning defeat.
Annie stretched, raising her arms into the air as she wandered over to her drawer to pick out her outfit for the day. After much consideration she chose something she had worn before earlier in the year - a straight blue top with black skinny jeans, she remembered picking out specifically to impress Jeff Winger.

As she snaked her legs through the jeans, she caught herself in the standing mirror across the room, black was definitely her color today. Bringing the jeans to her waist, she reached down and tried to bring the button closed, but found that she couldn't quite bridge the gap. With a sigh she took the jeans off and cast them back in the drawer. It was something she didn't want to think of. What if it were true? What her clothes had been shrunk in the wash by Troy and Abed during one of their laundry trips?
Without a second thought, she arranged a new outfit and prepared to greet Greendale with a record to make Annie Kim positively green with envy.


***

It was in the hallway that the two Annies would meet, on opposite sides like they were about to duel. They came together amidst the sea of faces with emphatic sighs and false pretenses - any observer would believe they were the best of friends, but underneath they both detested one another.

"Congratulations Annie!" Kim began, "Britta told me about your new record - 24 and a half, that's amazing!"
Annie was slightly taken aback, but ate up the unguarded praise all the same, it had been worth it, absolutely.
"Well, you know... it is just by half..." Annie tried to sound humble, but it was lost on Kim.
"Yes, yes. Oh! Speaking of records, I have someone you have to meet!"

Annie Kim turned away briefly, reaching through the crowd until she found someone and brought them towards Annie Edison.

A large woman with very full features had been drawn close, at first Annie didn't recognize her, but after a few seconds her distinct features won out.
It was Neil's girlfriend, Vicki, though in the months that Annie had seen her last she seemed to have nearly doubled her weight.

"You remember Vicki, Annie? Annie, Vicki?"

They both nodded, Annie dumbfounded and Vicki feeling out of place by the second.

"Vicki is Greendales protégé for Speed Eating - she's been in district competitions and has placed during the nationals."

Annie could do little to hide her faltering smile, and she seemed to be running out of false sincerity very quickly.

"We even managed to set a record last night - she ate seventeen hot dogs in just ten minutes! It was honestly one of the..."

Annie had stopped listening as Kim continued, she could only focus on Vicki... Vicki... Short for Victoria... Latin for... Victory. She tried to keep smiling but only managed to clench her teeth. She focused back on Kim with her boasting words... "And of course Neil is especially impressed with her - she's been trying to match her own personal best for a long time now. What are you going for now, Vicki?"

Trapped between the two Annies, Vicky was forced into the conversation.

"Uhh... 20 was my goal originally, but I'd be happy with 18 to be honest - it's still a milestone that-"

"Twenty hot dogs," Kim leaned in towards Vicki, practically taunting Annie. "Isn't that incredible Annie?"

She was forced to regain her composure. "Absolutely. Wow, Vicki..." was all that she could say.

"Well, we should get to class, congratulations again, Edison."

And they were gone, lost in a sea of students, though the wake that Vicki left was far more pronounced that Annie Kim's.



Tonight would have to be a night of record breaking firsts, for both Annies...
12213111111.title: You can't spell Victory without...

choices: One Week Later: Annie's Eating for Two Now
One Week Later: Annie's New Plan
122131111111.content:
"Annie, this is ridiculous..." Britta managed to spit out while chewing through her second hot dog.
"You just have to go a little faster, and don't talk, just-"
"No. You know what? Time." Britta dropped the hot dog onto the plate. Annie didn't budge.

"Time." Britta said unflinchingly, shooting Annie a serious look. She reluctantly clicked the stopwatch freezing the time on 1:31.

"We can't keep doing this Annie - I wanted to support you but this is taking things too far."

Annie was hardly listening, she was scribbing the details into the notebook, taking care to mark 1:31 as the frozen time.

"You're obsessing over all of this and it's just getting painful to watch!"

Annie glared at Britta over the notebook, "Well, you know what they say, 'no pain, no gain.'"

Britta sneered, "That's all we've been doing Annie, I don't know if you've noticed, but eating an entire vendors cart in hot dogs every night doesn't exactly give you a beach ready bod...

Annie frowned and turned away, flipping through the pages of the notebook to distract herself.

"I mean, look at this."

Annie ignored her, flipping through the pages more furiously.

"Annie. Seriously. Look."

Annie sighed, and snapped the notebook closed, bringing her full attention to Britta who stood up and lifted the front of her shirt. Annie tried to hide her surprise, but her eyebrows had already betrayed her. Annie had seen Brittas toned stomach before, and now she looked as though she were 6 months pregnant.

"I'm not eating any more hot dogs, and I'm sick of leaving this Study Hall feeling like I'm about to explode. Just put me down for two hot dogs and that's it."

Annie reached for the stopwatch still frozen at 1:31, "But there's still so much time left, if you just had a few m-"

"Annie!"

"Fine then, I guess I'll just carry us again like always!"

"Seriously? I'm the only one you could get to come to this stupid thing anyways..."

"Yeah, well... maybe I shouldn't have asked you to come at all!"

"Alright, I guess I should just go then, shouldn't I?

Annie folded her arms, hurt.

"I.. guess you should then."

Britta slung her bag over her shoulder and packed up her things, she left the Study Hall taking one look back at Annie.

"You're the worst."
122131111111.title: Britta is full and fed up

choices: What are Troy and Ahbed up to?
1221311111111.content:
"Troy and Abed in the Mooorning"

Annie awoke groggily for the third time, hearing her roomates shuffling about their shared apartment. She considered hitting the snooze button once more, just for a few minutes of extra sleep. Her stomach gurgled from beneath the blankets, still swollen following the latest attempt to break her current record. She reached down and massaged it, hoping to quell the sound of churning. She smiled to herself thinking about the previous night; she had broken through to new territory - sixteen and a half! But what was more than that, she had set a new record for herself during the 10 minutes that was reserved for Britta as well!

She remembered it vividly from the previous night - she had the stopwatch propped up on the notebook as she watched the LED numbers climb, 9:50, 9:51, 9:52.
Annie chewed voraciously through the final hotdog, number sixteen, her stomach was writhing in protest but she carried on trying her best to ignore it.
9:53, 9:54, 9:55.
She had finished the 16th hot dog and reached for the last one on her plate, she bit off half and began to chew like her life depended on it.
9:56, 9:57, 9:58
She swallowed, hard, and her stomach became a sloshing cauldron ready to bubble over at a moments notice - she was getting painfully full.
9:59, 10:00.

The stopwatch beeped its tinny cadence as Annie laid back in victory. She breathed as deep as she could manage and exhaled while stiffling a burp.

In the past, Annie would have stopped here, it would have been Brittas turn to take over while she could rest at watch Britta stuff herself. Now that Britta had officially left the club however, Annie had been conducting an experimental challenge with herself.
Even though the sixteenth hot dog and its trailing half had left Annies stomach feeling overstuffed and tight like a drum, she wanted to push herself further. Since the 10 minute time limit had been imposed, she finished eating when the timer concluded. Now, she had an extra 10 minutes to attempt to finish Brittas hot dogs, which could be counted towards the total score against Annie Kim - nobody could eat like her for 20 minutes straight.

The thought of Annie Kim was enough to motivate Annie Edison a second time, and she knew she couldn't break too long between ten minute sessions for it to be counted as authentic. So with that Annie reached for the stop watch, set a further 10 minutes and dragged the nearest plate of hot dogs towards her.

***

During the second attempt, Annie was not nearly as quick as she had been during her first Speed Eating session, and for good reason, while the initial battle was one of determination and confidence, the second relied more on trying to fill an already extremely stuffed stomach beyond capacity.
Annie multitasked chewing and rubbing her stomach, moaning when it seemed hopeless and swallowing hard when things seemed hopeful.

Everything in her body was telling her to stop, but she ignored them all and persevered, using one hand to massage her stomach as it got tighter and tighter with every bite.
After a particularily nasty jolt of pain shot through her belly, Annie chose to stop timer, leaving it frozen at 5:33.
She wanted to have more, but she knew that if did there would be trouble. She leaned back into her chair and exhaled heavily, her taut stomach completely round and immovable. 19 and a half hot dogs in 15 minutes - Annie Kim would be beside herself...


***
Back in her apartment, Annie had gotten out of bed and caught herself in the standing mirror across the room.

It was clear that a lot had changed from just one week ago. First of all, it wasn't just her stomach taking the extra weight, but it had been spread over her entire form fairly evenly, with her ass getting quite a generous portion.
Where her bangs had once framed a slender face, she was now sporting very full cheeks and a noticable double chin.
When she reached up to yawn, the top of her shirt came with it, exposing an inch of muffintop that had been previously hidden quite well.

After inspecting herself from the side, rear and front, she wandered over to her drawer to pick out her outfit for the day. Whereas Annie used to consider all of the arguments for matching color, brand and style, her main focus had developed into finding something that would just fit. Luckily, an old t-shirt from Jeff Winger that used to fit her extremely loosely that she was just beginning to outgrow in the waist did the trick.
She still couldn't decide on pajama bottoms or sweat pants, but this soon took a backseat to more pressing manners:

What would Annie Kims response be to a proposed 20 minute challenge? She knew that Vicki could easily outclass her in a 10 minute sessio, but if it were extended to 15 or 20 minutes, perhaps Vicki would slow down just enough to allow her to overtake her...

Grabbing the sweat pants out of the drawer, Annie hoisted them on with little effort and inspected the damage; her stomach was pressing up against the drawstring, it gave a low gurgle as she attempted to adjust it before giving up.

Right, onto Greendale!
1221311111111.title: One Week Later: Annie's Eating for Two Now

12213111111111.content:
Inside the Group Study Room F, things were getting heated as Jeff tried tackle the delicate subject of Annie's weight with the rest of the group.

"I'm just saying, if one of us mentions it, it'll stop being the elephant in the room..." Jeff reasoned.

"Or..." Britta countered, "You'll make her feel bad about it because she'll know that you've noticed."

"Yes but if she knows that we know, then it'll cause her to do something about it" Jeff retorted.

"Listen - this isn't something you can sum up in a Winger speech," Britta flared before bringing her voice down "Besides, Annie's sensitive about it..."

"Alright well... Maybe we can deal with it in a... sensitive way then."

"Impossible." Abed offered, "The more covertly you try to awkwardly broach the topic, the more it'll be interpreted in the opposite for comedic effect."

"Jeffrey, if you want to tell Annie you can do it yourself." Shirley began in a sing-song voice before slipping down into her brazen sotto voce, "She's been buying my sandwiches all week."

Exasperated, Jeff rolled his eyes and focused on the rest of the group. "Okay, okay - when Annie comes in we'll just be completely straight-up, do or die."
Britta tutted in disgust but Jeff plowed through regardless,
"If it were any of us in her situation we'd want to know right?"
The rest of the group mumbled in hesitant agreement as Jeff concluded, standing.
"Alright. So, all we have to do is talk to Annie about..."

"Talk to me about what?"

From behind Jeff, Annie had entered the Study Hall in sweatpants and a tight blue top, carrying her book bag in one hand and an empty Shirley's Sandwiches bag in the other. Annie's shirt was doing very little to hide her figure, already fighting a losing battle it could only barely cover her belly button. She passed Jeff as he tried to collect his thoughts as she sat down heavily beside Shirley.

"Annie. I uh... heh." Jeff started awkwardly. Britta tried to do some damage control.
"Weee... just wanted to know how your club is doing... lately."

Annie could only glow with pride as she smirked, "Well, you'll be pleased to know that the Gastrointestinal Giants set a new record last night; 19 and a half hot dogs in 20 minutes by one person - not even Annie Kim can compete with that."

"That's great Annie really, so uhh... does that mean you're going to stop now?" Britta offered.

"Are you kidding? Annie Kim isn't going down on a technicality, she's going to *urp* regret ever messing with Annie Edison!"

The group exchanged worried glances as Annie savored her victory speech.

"Aren't you getting a little tired of hot dogs though?" Jeff questioned.

"Absolutely, but I won't be eating any more hot dogs after today. Each club has to agree to a rotation to keep things fair, and I've got a secret weapon."

"Sandwiches?" Shirely piped up hopefully.

"Nope. Something not even Annie Kim can stomach...
12213111111111.title: Back at Greendale

122131111111111.content:
On the Greendale bulletin board, a new notice had been added which Annie Kim read with utter contempt,

Greendale Creamery Sponsors: Milkshake Drinking - Gastrointestinal Giants Eating Club 7:00.

Before Annie Kim could begin to form a plan, she heard a familiar voice behind her - it was Annie Edison.

"Don't worry, I've already cleared it with the Dean - both clubs are required to hold equal sponsorships, so you're officially sponsored too!"

This did very little to change Annie Kim's mood - she KNEW that the only reason milkshakes had been suggested was because she was lactose intolerant - it wasn't enough for her to lose her last record, now she was being counted out before the second week could even begin!
Annie Kim spun to meet her gaze with Annie Edison - to be fair, both Annie's had put on weight, but Edison was easily out-pacing her rival. While Annie Kim had gone from an extra-small to a tight fitting small, Annie had gone the distance with a medium that barely reached her jeans, showcasing her belly which pushed out above her belt.

"Unless..." Continued Annie, "You want to revoke a sponsorship, which just takes a few days..."

"NO!" Snapped Annie before softening her tone, "No, err... that's fine. Thanks for submitting the paperwork, Edison."

Annie Kim knew if she tried to renegotiate the sponsorship she would lose at least a week worth of competition, not to mention the black mark a revoked sponsor would leave on her clubs name. No, she would have to go through with it.

Annie smirked with false sentiment as she finished,

"Great. I'm so glad - here's to milkshakes!"

Annie Kim returned the same smile, positively burning under her exterior.

"To Milkshakes."
122131111111111.title: Annie's Secret Weapon

1221311111111111.content:
7:00 PM arrived quickly at Greendale that night, and while Annie had set up seats for at least 8 club members, she was shocked when not a single person had shown up.
Maybe Annie Kim had been bad-mouthing her, or worse still, maybe everyone knew how impulsive Annie could be, and chose to skip the club altogether.
Still, with or without any help, Annie knew she had gotten the upper hand - there was no way that Annie Kim could compete now, she would be forcing everything on the rest of the group.
If Annie could get one person to join the club, just one, she knew she would be able to ride that to victory.

The next half hour was spent measuring out ice cream, blending in milk and adding some chocolate powder for taste. The mixture was then added to several tall glasses that Annie placed next to each other - she jotted out the details in her notebook and prepared to drink.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~

The first milkshake was by far the easiest, Annie lapped up the thick mixture as she tipped the glass upward, her tongue darting out to catch the heavy dollops of ice cream left behind. In just a minute it had been completely emptied, the glass echoed as it hit the table and Annie sighed in relief. She tallied down the result under the 1:00 column and then began to work on the second milkshake.

Half way through the second milkshake, Annie could feel her stomach protesting as it gurgled and sloshed, she was getting pretty full - but she had to continue. She finished the milky mixture, savoring the taste as she wrote the results in the notebook as well. Annie stifled a burp as she reached for the third milkshake, much to the protests of her quite full stomach.

Reaching the mid-way point of her third milkshake, Annie started to question her methods; she thought that the liquid nature of the milkshakes would reduce her chewing time that was being taken up with the hot dogs, but the liquid only seemed to fill her up faster and more completely. She gulped her way through the third milkshake as she found no further liquid to greet her. Annie placed the empty cup down and with a shaking hand marked her results down in the third column.

As Annie reached for the fourth milkshake, a pain shot through her middle - she was now painfully full, and her drawstring was digging into her expanding belly.
She took a second to adjust her pants, bringing the fabric down as she sighed in relief, letting her belly flow outward onto her lap unbridled.
"Oooh..." Annie winced, "Just a *urp* few more..."

The fourth milkshake was finished in just over 3 minutes - while Annie had started off strong, she felt that she could no longer ignore the sharp pains that shot through her stomach and it was taking more time to convince herself to keep going. Even the thoughts of Annie Kim were hazy as Annie pushed herself on.

The thick mixture traveled down her throat as she tried to chug the contents of the fourth milkshake, massaging her incredibly taut stomach between gulps, wincing and moaning with every swallow. When Annie had reached the end of the milkshake, she was practically gasping for air, clutching her stomach and she buckled forwards.

"Got to *hic* keep *hic* going..." Annie groaned as she made another mark in her notebook under the fourth column. She was really reaching breaking point now, her stomach felt completely solid and even breathing in led to shallow breaths that sent pain ebbing through her entire body.

The fifth milkshake stood ahead, the final glass standing between Annie and victory. With unsteady hands, Annie reached for the drink and pulled it closer, breathing in the mixture of milk, ice cream and powdered chocolate was making her feel sick. Annie tried to take a deep breath to steady herself but that only made her wince in pain as she continued to hiccup. Annie cooed, massaging her stomach and preparing to tilt the mixture up off of the table and into her waiting lips.
This was it...
Annie brought the rim to her lips as she angled the glass upward. Gulp. Gulp. Gulp. Each swallow of heavy milkshake seemed to be causing her stomach to swell outwards an inch. Her eyes shut completely, Annie could only continue swallowing automatically, her nose getting its own taste of ice cream, milk and chocolate powder.

Suddenly, a burst of pain jolted through her body, causing Annie to nearly drop the glass as she yelped in pain. In reflex she reached for her stomach and was shocked at just how full it was. She had never felt as full in her life as she did at this moment - Annie was completely, and undeniably stuffed.
Biting her bottom lip, Annie looked into the glass - there was just a quarter of mixture left, but it might as well have been a swimming pools worth as far as her stomach was concerned.

"Ohmygosh... oh... please... please just a *hic* little bit more..." Annie whimpered. "There's only *hic* only... three gulps left...

Slowly, she began to raise the glass to her lips. "Only... *hic* three gulps..."

As soon as the mixture hit Annie's lips, she began to feel dizzy - her stomach was now audibly groaning, and churning below, attempting in vain to digest nearly 5 full glasses of heavy milkshake mix. Above, Annie was going against every instinct, forcing herself to finish it all.
Annie was always an over-achiever, but she wasn't content with 100%, now her belly felt like it was at 110% capacity and Annie was straining to have it reach 120% at all costs.
She gulped once. The heavy milkshake traveled down her throat and her belly went into an instant tantrum. She clutched it out of reflex, buckling over as she squinted through the burning tears in her eyes. "Just two... just... oooh...two more"
Annie pushed on, bringing the glass to her lips as she angled it upward, taking in another mouthful of milkshake. She felt her stomach, rubbing it as she prepared to gulp, and was briefly shocked at how much her belly button seemed to push outward. Preparing for the worst, Annie took the next swallow of milkshake as it seemed to hit her stomach instantly. "Oh WOW!" Annie cried out, eyes wide open."This is... ohhh...this is too much..."

Her stomach rumbled in agreement, sloshing its contents as Annie clenched her teeth together. "Too much..."
A beeping from across the table had suddenly caught Annie's attention - it was the timer she had set for 20 minutes; it was counting down the final 10 seconds.
Annie turned back to the glass with newfound ill-placed determination and she looked down at the last bit of milkshake with equal parts fear and anger.

Annie fastened her gaze, took a deep breath and brought the glass to her lips one final time...

GULP.

Annie had dropped the glass out of pain, but by some miracle it didn't shatter on the Study Room floor - not that she would have noticed. Annie cooed, taking in shallow breaths and trying to quell the massive pains that she felt in her overstuffed belly.
"Ohhhhh... Ohmygosh that was..." Annie breathed in wincing, burping aloud, "that was... *urp* waaay too much..."
For the next hour, Annie sat at the Study Room table, her lips coated in milkshake mix, her pants pushed down by her beachball of a stomach and her panties completely soaked through the trial.
Annie had overdone it, but she had done it, and that's all she cared about now...
1221311111111111.title: Annie's Milkshake Chugging

12213111111111111.content:
Although hours had passed since her milkshake gauntlet, Annie was still feeling the effects of the heavy mixture the following day.
While not as significantly round as it was the night previous, her stomach still managed to press against her jeans uncomfortably and exposed about an inch of flesh from her steadily growing muffin top.
As Annie walked the halls she was stealing looks from the rest of the student body, who couldn't stop staring and whispering amongst themselves, but Annie was too caught up in her own victory to pay any attention, and she made her way to her locker in stride.

Depositing the notebook into its proper spot, Annie prepared to exchange her supplies for next class when she suddenly heard a voice from behind her.

"Hey Edison..."

It was Annie Kim. She wheeled around to meet the gaze of her adversary.

"Thanks again for setting up our sponsor for this week."

Annie Kim brandished her teeth like knives, she had some plan hiding behind a malicious grin.

"Oh, not a problem," Annie E. returned with the same false sentimentality, "Sponsors are always looking out for talent at Greendale"

"Oh, I agree," Annie Kim nodded, "That's why I've been speaking to Greendale Creamery for their input, and they've offered up some feedback."

"They... have?" Annie was slightly taken aback.

Annie Kim began to smile even wider, "Yes, just a modification of some of the ingredients, but don't worry - it's all covered by the Greendale Social Events budget."

Annie Kim withdrew a note from within her bag and presented it to Annie Edison, which she took begrudgingly.

"Uh, thanks..."

"Not a problem, the interests of the sponsor is something that we should definitely adhere to, unless, you disagree?..."

"No! Err... no of course not."

Annie Kim nearly sneered,

"Excellent. I'm so glad we're on the same page."

And with that, Annie Kim spun away from the locker, heading down the bustling hallway with her plan already in motion - if she didn't have to keep up her sugar-coated facade, she would have laughed maniacally.

At her locker, Annie Edison unfolded the note and read the list of ingredients; there was only one change, and it made her eyes go wide as her stomach gurgled in a dull pain.
12213111111111111.title: A Change to the Rules...

choices: Britta continues to chug her creamshake
122131111111111111.content:
At 6:50 PM, Annie had arrived in Study Room F with a bag of ingredients in hand - she placed it on the table and began to withdraw each item.
One tin of chocolate powder mix, one tub of vanilla ice cream... and then the final newly modified ingredient... one gallon of Greendale Creamery 'Heavy Whipping Cream'.

She opened the jug began to pour it into her milkshake mixer; it came out slowly and incredibly thick. Annie was already regretting what she would have to do tonight, but her principles had to be put first - she couldn't back out on Annie Kim now, she couldn't lose the sponsorship!
And so Annie continued to pour the Heavy Whipping Cream, following it up with a few spoonfuls of powdered chocolate mix and a few heavy spoonfuls of vanilla ice cream.

As the milkshake mixer whirred to life, Annie tried to shirk off her feeling of dread, "It's just cream, I mean... I've had cream before..." What began as a self-assuredness soon fell as Annie noticed that the mechanized whisking had done very little to dilute the mix.
Without any recourse, she turned off the milkshake maker, removed the mix from its cradle and began to pour it into 5 glasses she had prepared.
After pouring out the rich creamshake, she realized there was quite a bit left still in the mixer - Annie could only dread what that would mean for the measurements, or her own measurements for that matter.
Cracking open the notepad she drew up a new table with her name on the top, separating it into 5 columns and then took a deep breath as she prepared to start on the first heavy milkshake...

Suddenly, the door to Study Room F opened, and Britta Perry entered, taking Annie by surprise.

"Britta?"

"Hey Annie..." Britta began in a slightly guilty tone, "Um... Jeff thinks I'm well, stupid for coming down here, but... I couldn't just let you do this on your own... I... I'm sorry... for last time."

"Oh." Annie piped, "Umm..."

"Maybe Jeff was right, this feels stupid..." Britta turned on her heel embarrassed as she prepared to leave.

"Wait!" Annie squeaked, stopping Britta in her tracks, "I'm glad you came back. Please. Stay?"

Britta turned to face Annie, both of them smiling at their newfound comradery.

"So... what are you working on, Goldie Hawn?"

Britta sat down at the table as Annie was pulled back to the issue at hand, her warm expression faltering as she turned serious.

"Okay, well, hot dogs are out..."

"Phew, good! I'm done with those for life."

"And milkshakes..." Annie continued, sliding the nearest one with her pencil towards Britta, "are in."

"Right. So exactly how many of these do we have to drink?"

"Yesterday I finished off with 5, but since you're here... I could do 4 and you could do 2 for 6..."

"That sounds fair, but I'm not going to go over that okay? I just finished off working off those hot dogs."

In a way Britta was right, she was entering slim territory once more, but it would be a lie to say that she was back to her original weight - her abs were still quite pouchy and the remnants of a muffin top still persisted.

"Absolutely." Annie nodded, watching as Britta tipped up the glass to her lips, tasting the flavor.

"Mmmm!" Britta peaked with glee, "This is really good Annie - what's in it?"

Annie found herself suddenly frozen, not unlike the time she had tried to imitate Blade over the phone to Britta. She couldn't tell her that she was downing a quart and a half of cream - she knew that would be enough to send Britta packing, and leave her to finish the rest all by herself. Luckily Britta hadn't seen Annie's 'deer-in the-headlights' stare, as she had brought the glass to her lips once more. Annie took this moment to collect herself.

"Ohhh..." Annie mused, "You know - just a bit of vanilla ice cream and a really high quality chocolate powder mix."

"Yeah, I taste that for sure, it's just so... sweet too."

"Well, I'm really glad you like it."

Britta hadn't responded to Annie, now lost in downing the rest of the milkshake. Annie breathed a sigh of relief at the potential bullet she had just dodged.

In just under 45 seconds, Britta had managed to drain the glass completely, licking her lips to catch any remnant of the creamy drink.

"That was better than I thought it would be," Britta mused. "Alright, your turn."

Annie looked towards her own milkshake, thanks to Britta there were only 5 left but the premise of drinking at least three of them still seemed daunting. After marking the results on the page under a new column marked 'Britta', Annie grabbed the milkshake and tipped the creamy mixture past her lips.
Britta wasn't kidding, the rich texture of the cream was only made sweeter by the inclusion of the ice cream - the chocolate power only served to bring the entire package together into something like a mudslide.
Within seconds, Annie had managed to drink nearly a quarter of the creamshake, gulping fervently to savor it.
She tried not to think of how much damage she was doing, drinking what amounted to thick liquid ice cream - but if Britta was willing to help her, that's all she needed to keep drinking.
As her timer hit 30 seconds, Annie had already managed to down more than half, willing herself on to keep going and match Britta's time of 43 seconds. Annie's could feel the effects of the rich cream already settling in her stomach, pushing it outwards as she took the next few gulps. Tilting the glass back, Annie managed to drain all of the remaining liquid in 44 seconds, stifling a burp as she set it down - as she turned her attention back to Britta however, she noticed that the blonde had already began to drink.

Annie watched as Britta tilted the glass upwards, gulping down the thick creamshake in steady swallows. In just 40 seconds, Britta had managed to drink more than half of the milkshake which sent Annie reeling with unexpected awe. While Britta kept chugging, she started to fumble at her jeans with her spare hand. Failing to find what she was looking for, she stood up still drinking and managed to unbutton her jeans expertly. The resulting freedom sent her belly pushing outwards, practically inflating as it was filled with cream - Annie could only watch in amazement as Britta continued to drink while massaging her stomach with her free hand, and in a matter of seconds, Britta had finished the entire drink.

"Bwaaa*urp* ohhh..." Britta moaned, still massaging her stomach, "Ok Annie... it's up to you..."

Annie nodded and grabbed her second glass - all she needed to do was finish two more after this and she would beat her record for the previous night!
She began earnestly, bringing the glass to her lips which were once again greeted by the sticky sweet texture of the heavy whipping cream. Annie gulped the mix down as quickly as possible, still hoping to keep her momentum up for the next glasses. She was renewed with a vengeance, she could picture Annie Kim, unable to drink any of the milkshake, forcing it upon the rest of the club to pick up the slack. A sly smile escaped her lips as she continued to drink.
Setting down an empty glass, Annie massaged her full stomach as she reached for the third glass, it too started down easily enough, but after a few minutes it was clear that Annie was starting to hit her limit; the cream filled her up much more quickly than the milk, and her stomach was already starting to protest.

Even unbuttoning her pants did little to alleviate the feeling of fullness, which felt like a huge rock in the pit of her stomach. Breathing heavily, Annie willed herself on, taking gulps with gusto as she drained her third glass of the night in just under 5 minutes. "Urrg... Oh...*urp*" Annie mumbled as she placed the empty glass down on the table.

"Just *hic* two more now..." Annie winced as she reached for the fourth glass.

"Wait, Annie!" Britta called out, "I'll do this one, then you'll only have that one to do - you have to take breaks between them!"

"Thanks... *urp* Britta..." Annie said weakly as she continued to massage her stomach - could she even finish that last glass? It seemed impossible.

Britta began strong as well, but even she seemed to slow down as she reached the half way mark. Drawing the glass away from her lips, she took in a few short painful breaths as her eyes met Annie's.

"I have... oooh... never been this full in my life..."
122131111111111111.title: Annie's Creamshake Collaboration

choices: The Plot (Along with Annie and Britta) Thickens
1221311111111111111.content:
With one hand clutching her stomach, Britta returned to drinking the remainder of the milkshake, gulping down every thick drop and wincing in pain with every swallow. In a matter of minutes the deed had been done, and Britta lolled back in her chair, fervently massaging her stomach and taking short, shallow breaths. With a weak arm, Britta lifted her pointer finger towards Annie, who seem transfixed. "G-go... last one right?"

Annie nodded and turned to the final milkshake. If she could drink it all in less than 3 minutes they would have made a new record.
Determined, Annie took as deep a breath as her stomach would allow and began to chug the milkshake. Gulp, gulp, gulp.
Annie could feel her stomach slowly swelling, surging forward past her jeans, laden with heavy whipping cream.
In just over two minutes, she had managed to finish more than half, but immediately hit a wall as her stomach gurgled loudly.

"Oohh... I don't think I can *urp* drink anymore..." Annie whined as Britta sat up in her chair, still massaging her stomach.

"Here, I'll finish...ooohh... I'll finish it..."

Annie passed the glass over as the bloated blonde began to chug heavily, she squirmed as the liquid poured down her throat and into her very overstuffed belly.
Britta managed to finish the mixture just as Annie's stopwatch began to beep. "YES! *urp* Oh man..." Britta's brief moment of victory was soon overtaken by nausea as she clutched her stomach with both hands.
With their glasses completely emptied, both Annie and Britta congratulated each other through shallow breaths, overcoming the extremely heavy feeling in their stomachs together.
1221311111111111111.title: Britta continues to chug her creamshake

choices: Annie and Britta spy on Annie Kim
12213111111111111111.content:
Three further meetings for the Gastrointestinal Giants had taken place that week, Annie and Britta had been setting new records each night, steadily increasing their records from 6 milkshakes to 8 1/2, and finally 9 during the last session.
Britta still had no idea that she was drinking heavy whipping cream every night, but the results began to show almost immediately.
The important thing, Annie reasoned, was that Annie Kim was losing her spot as the shining student, leaving her to fill the role - and that was something Annie was doing a lot of these days...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

It was 15 minutes before first period, and Annie had visited her locker to exchange her books - she opened it wide and caught a glimpse of the fuller face that met her in the mirror hanging there. Taking in her less defined features, round cheeks and prominent double chin, it was clear that Annie had officially surpassed the freshman fifteen and was becoming a softer sophomore.
Carrying on, Annie deposited the rest of her books and made a mental note to pick up a few binders for next week. From behind, Annie was unaware of the students staring at her filled out features, mainly her plush rear end which seemed to stick out as she bent it for further supplies.

Fortunately the crowd was deterred as Britta made her way through towards Annie's locker with triumphant strides.

In the time since Britta Perry had rejoined the Gastrointestinal Giants, she had managed to gain back all of the weight she managed to lose - thanks to the heavy cream milkshakes, Britta was actively gaining more and more weight every night, quickly outgrowing most of her wardrobe.
Her midsection was taking it especially hard, with most of her old clothes figure-hugging tight pieces, Britta had no choice but to try and bring a conventional outfit together with a top that didn't quite cover up her abdomen, and sweatpants that were being strained by the drawstring. In short, most of the time Britta was walking around with at least three inches of her rounded stomach exposed - like Annie, she too was starting to develop a double chin.


"Annie! Annie, guess what?" the blonde could barely contain her excitement as she approached. "Fat Neil has left Annie Kim's club!"

Annie beamed, her round cheeks dimpling. "That's great! Now we've finally leveled the playing field!"

"Don't forget - she's still got Vicky though," Britta warned, "We'll have to go at this thing twice as hard."

Annie thought for a moment before a sly grin began to invade, "Would you protest much if we pushed back our meeting time tonight?"

"Umm... not really." Britta rested a hand on her stomach, "To be honest I'm still pretty full from yesterday."

"I think we should see what we're really up against," Annie returned with a look of deviousness, "If we start at 9 PM, we can do a bit of reconnaissance duty at the other study hall before then."

"You mean, spy on Annie Kim?" Britta asked, intrigued at the prospect.

"That's the plan, Vince McMahon..."
12213111111111111111.title: The Plot (Along with Annie and Britta) Thickens

choices: Annie and Britta aim to chug 10 milkshakes - they're successful.
Annie and Britta aim to chug 10 milkshakes - they're unsuccessful.
122131111111111111111.content:
Under the cover of darkness Britta and Annie had met up in Group Study Room F to plot their plan of action - both had gone the extra mile, kitted out in tight black jumpsuits from their previous spying antics.

"Alright, let's see here..." Annie whispered, bringing up the Greendale schedule on her phone, "Annie Kim should be in Study Room B - if we go around the north wing and then duck out to avoid the motion cameras we'll be able to see them through the east window."

"Perfect," Britta whispered back, "Also, why are we whispering?"

"It sets the tone - now grab your things and let's go spy on Annie Kim."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The chubby duo made their way down the poorly-lit north wing corridor in a state of constant vigilance, diving under low windows, crawling past surveillance measures and getting ever closer to Study Room B.

"It's just through here, come on!" Britta shot, gesturing to the door leading outside to an antechamber. Britta followed and they soon found themselves outside of the window to the Study Room - luckily the shades hadn't been drawn, and they were free to peer in and watch the latest developments.
And there was certainly a lot of developments....

From one side of the table, Annie Kim held onto a clipboard, marking results quickly as her icy glare stared across the room towards...

Vicky. The only club member left of Annie Kim's group, surrounded by empty glasses of creamshake as she continued to chug the latest one down.
As she angled the glass upward, the final heavy drops of cream slid down towards Vicky's waiting lips, and within a few seconds, the brunette had brought the drink down completely drained.
It was here that Annie could see the transformation in Vicky's appearance from just a few weeks ago - her face, while always round to an extent, was now extremely full, framed with three distinct chins, her chubby cheeks made even larger from the constant supply of creamshake.
If Britta had to guess, she would estimate that Vicky had put on nearly 50 pounds in the last two weeks alone; her clothes looked to be outgrown as they tried in vain to cover her expanding body - her legs and arms were extremely thick, looking more like tree trunks - the biggest development though, was her belly.
It seemed like most of the weight had hit hard there - while it had been quite round in the times that Annie and Britta had seen Vicky before, now it was flat-out spherical, filled to the point of bursting every night with milkshakes.

As Vicky tried her best to catch her breath from her latest drink, Annie Kim scribbled a number down and broke the silence,

"Go, go go! We need to beat 10 remember? You have to be quicker!"

Reacting, Vicky grabbed the next drink and began drinking it quickly, Annie Kim only looked on at her stopwatch with increasing intensity.

Outside of the window, Annie Edison looked in awe before turning back to Britta and whispering harshly,

"TEN?! She's making Vicky drink TEN of them?"

Britta nodded as she took in the scene, "There's no way she can do that - she'll explode."

Back inside, Vicky had managed to drink nearly half of the shake before she took it away from her lips with a pained expression.

"I think... Ohh... I think I need... a break" Vicky wheezed.

"We don't have time! You have to keep drinking Vicky, otherwise the data will be unbalanced next meeting!"

Vicky slid the glass across the table with two chubby fingers, "Please... help me *hic* finish it."

Annie Kim slid the glass back towards Vicky with her pencil twice as hard, "I told you, I can't - I'm lactose intolerant. You have to do this, for both of us!"

Rubbing her stomach, Vicky seemed to see no way out, and brought the glass to her lips and began gulping down the mixture reluctantly.

"Come on Annie, this is wrong." Britta hissed, "We need to put a stop to this."

Annie fought an internal battle, focusing on Vicky continuing to chug before turning back to Britta.

"Alright... fine. I'll meet with the Dean tomorrow and tell him to-"

"Come ON! I haven't lost to that Edison BITCH and I'm not going to start now!"

A new flare had sparked in Annie's eyes as she looked in to Annie Kim with vitriol.

"Actually, let's see how this works out..."

Inside, Vicky was hitting her limit as she gulped down the final drops of heavy cream from her glass, pulling it away from her lips wearily, and setting it down on the table with an empty echo. As Annie Kim scribbled onto the clipboard, Vicky leaned back in her chair, desperately searching for something around her midsection. The next second she found it, and in one heavy motion, Vicky pulled down the zipper to her pants, allowing her extremely full stomach to surge outwards into her lap.

"Ohh... *urp* Annie, I'm so full..."

The irony wasn't lost on the leather-clad duo peering in from outside the window, all at once Annie Edison felt rather guilty for watching the session with Britta.

"Just two more to go Vicky, I know you can do it" Annie Kim piped up encouragingly.

It was here that the dawning realization struck Annie, "She's had eight milkshakes alone!"

Both of the women looked back into the window in horror as Vicky reached for her ninth glass of creamshake, reluctantly bringing the mixture to her lips as she massaged her painfully stuffed stomach once again. In a matter of minutes, she had managed to drain the entire glass and set it down onto the table wincing in pain.

"OoOoOohh... That's it! Ohh *urp*... That's it..." Vicky sputtered as she clutched her stomach, "I can't drink anymore Annie, please..."

Using her pencil, Annie Kim pushed the final glass towards Vicky which seemed to make the bloated brunette queasy.

"I can't... Annie... Ohh... please. Let's just have... 9 tonight."

"If we only put down nine we'll be tied with Annie and Britta." Annie Kim affirmed as she shoved the glass even closer towards Vicky.

"Let's do that then... ohhh...*hic* let's tie with them."

"I don't want to tie with Annie Edison," Annie Kim flared, "I want to BURY her! Now... DRINK!"

Vicky brought the creamshake to her lips and began to drink it down in heavy gulps, from below her stomach was gurgling and sloshing violently. As Vicky began to angle the glass downward, Annie Kim shot forward with her pencil and kept the glass tilted high.
