Pam awoke in her bed, wearing only a bra and her pyjama bottoms and looked at her clock. It read 10:00 am, causing Pam to briefly panic before she remembered it was Saturday, and Jim had obviously woken up to take care of CC, allowing Pam to lay back down and exhale her worries. Her head was sore, and her vision blurry. As she tried to remember what happened the night before, she realized her memory was foggy, Hmmm think Pam think... well, I vaguely recalls some wine, there were a few beers, oh yeah and some shots... oh my goodness no wonder I can't remember any of it... Pam began to remember more and more events, remembering she was at a girls night with her work friends at Burger Valley. Oh my god... now I remember... Pam thought in horror. She quickly rushed to find her purse, searching to find a receipt. As she searched around, she finally found it, causing Pams' Jaw to drop. Over the night, Pam ordered unlimited cheese fries and a "Zesty Taco Burger" to start, but as she kept on drinking she kept on eating, putting away a "Grilled Mac, Bacon and Cheese Burger" and a "Hot Heat Burger". Even after all of that, Pam then ordered a garlic bread and a pound of chicken wings. By the end of the night Pam had eaten and drank herself beyond memory, but even still this morning her belly appears bloated and is sticking out more and more every day.

The past week had been intense on Pams figure. Her first Monday back resulted in such a massive feast with her new foodie coworkers showing her what she missed over maternity leave, she couldn't even buckle her belt on her way home. She even ordered a whole pizza for herself for dinner, her gluttony shocking Jim. Pam hoped Tuesday would be better, a little easier to resist the food and maybe even start to lose some of her new found weight. Unfortunately for her however, Tuesday was an even greater challenge. As Pam walked into the building she could smell their pastries and breakfast foods, and almost every time she would see at least one coworker chowing down and wave her in to join. They pulled her to the cafeteria for lunch and made sure to remind her to try something different than Monday. Erin would hand out treats almost every half hour since Micheal knew how much people enjoyed them, causing almost everyones waistlines even more expansion. Wednesday and Thursday followed the same trajectory, having Pam guilted into eating breakfast, hand fed sweets all day and stuffed like a turkey for a solid lunch, and the inevitable undone belt as she walked to her Car. Friday started out better because no one saw her as she walked by the cafeteria, allowing her to skip breakfast and lay off food until break. However, avoiding the first few offers from Erin was hard, and it only got harder and harder watching her coworkers stuff all her favourite treats into their bellies. But she lasted until first break, and figured she deserved a doughnut (or 3). She continued to snack until lunch, justifying it by thinking she was still doing a lot better than the rest of her week so far. Lunch on the other hand, was a failure. She ate more than she had at any other lunch, eating a tray loaded with some pizza, a couple double burgers, poutine, 2 bacon and egg sandwiches, 3 slices of cake, 2 doughnuts and 5 cookies. Pam was stuffed to the brim, but something about her appetite was so insatiable that it seemed impossible that she'd ever stop eating. Of course she did, but not without a massive burp and gas for the rest of her shift.

Friday was different though, because rather than her usual "go home and eat dinner with Jim", she was invited for a "girls night" with her coworkers. Pam figured she needed some fun time, especially since she was getting along with everyone better than before, and she wanted to keep that up. So, Pam went home and got cleaned up for her first night out since CC was born. She was excited, until she began to get dressed. All of her old pre-pregnancy clothes were definitely too small, that made her unhappy but she wasn't really surprised, but even her newest clothes were tight on her frame. One shirt pressed onto her belly, showing off her love handles and gut, while her breasts were getting much larger by the day, pressing on the top of her shirt and causing the bottom to lift up and expose some of her pale fleshy belly. Pams button up shirts were starting to stretch, but they showed less skin than her other ones, so she put on a pink button up shirt. Pams pants were all tight, but she managed to get one pair on after a few attempts, reminding herself to go easy on food or else she would burst out of her clothes. Pam heard a car honking out front of her house, which must have meant Kelly was there to pick her up. She quickly ran as to not keep Kelly waiting, after saying bye to Jim and CC first of course. The rest of the night felt like a blur, but she recalls pigging out and clearly drank way more than she should have.

Now, on Saturday morning, Pam is forced to start her diet off right, with some healthy breakfast! She put on a T shirt over her bra and walked to the kitchen. She began to smell something great, Ohhh myyy is that bacon? And eggs, and... pancakes? Pam walked into the kitchen to find her husband cooking a very large breakfast. All over the table was an assortment of foods, such as waffles, pancakes, hash browns, eggs, sausages, bacon, and even an omelette!

"Hey babe, you seemed like you had a fun night, thought you might want some hangover breakfast." Jim said smiling, gesturing at the table. Pams jaw was dropped at the kind gesture from her husband.

"Oh you shouldn't have, this is soo thoughtful Jim, thank you!" Pam said, kissing her husbands cheek.

"Oh and I got you these too." Jim pulled out a box of pastries and handed them to Pam, who's mouth started drooling at the smell.

"Oh wow you are just so great! You have been seeing how much weight I've gained right?" Pam laughed, trying to get a reaction from her Husband.

"Pam you just had a baby, it's very normal. And besides, you're still gorgeous just the same, I love you no matter what! Now, go eat, while the food is till warm." Jim said, kissing his wife as she walked over to the table. She propped open the box and grabbed a chocolate covered doughnut, taking a quick bite and moaning before setting the box down and sitting at the table. Pam began to grab different items, a handful of bacon here, and few sausages there. She finished the hash browns first, and then the bacon, sausages, waffles. Pam was devouring her husbands fantastic meal.

This is the life... mmmm... all this food is just so goooood! Pam thought while taking a large bite from an omelette. I'm definitely going to have to take him to the bedroom after my stomach settles down... he's earned that and more for this great meal.... mmm such good pancakes! Pam belched after finishing a pancake drenched in syrup. I really need to diet, but maybe I should just indulge for a little bit longer? What's the harm in pushing the diet back few days? If she wasn't at work eating at the cafeteria or at home enjoying Jims cooking, she would be dining out at Burger Valley or she would order take-out, so she had no shortage of food at her disposal. Obviously, with all these opportunities available for Pam to overeat, came the consequences she was trying to avoid with her so called “diet” a few weeks before. It was officially 4 weeks since Pam decided to push her diet back a “few days”. While Pam wasn’t happy about her increasing size, she found the food and the fun that comes along with it too irresistible to stop, at least for a little while longer anyways. Pam has had to upgrade her wardrobe a couple of times over the past month, reminding her of her increasing waistline, but also slowly allowing her to accept the changes to her fatter figure.

Since returning to work Pam has managed to put on 30 pounds, putting her new weight at 210. Pam sported a pot belly that had officially grown to rest on her belt even when she was holding in her breath. Her boobs were larger than they were when she was pregnant, slightly resting on her belly whenever she sits down in her desk chair. Pams arms were looking thicker and thicker, jiggling more and more every day, while her ass followed suit as it grew fatter and fatter, jiggling with every step she made and giving her more padding when she sat down. Pam looked downright fat since going back to work, and based on the fact she was still eating far more food than any one person needs to, she was only going to look larger and larger over time at the office. Even though they had a young baby, they were finding time to still enjoy each others company in and out of the bedroom. Clearly Pams weight gain hadn't been turning her husband off, as he was still very much into bedroom activities with his wife, even with her new bulk.

It’s been exactly 4 weeks since her letting go of herself, and currently she is running errands with Jim while her mother Helene is watching Cece at home. They were just leaving the grocery store parking lot, about to head back to the house for lunch when Jim heard Pams belly started to grumble in the passenger seat. Knowing his wife, she is probably wanting a snack even though she knows lunch is right around the corner, so without even asking Jim pulls into a QuickBurger drive through, causing Pam to ask where he was going.

“Jim it’s almost lunch time, I should probably just wai-” Jim placed his hand up, gesturing her to stop as he lowered his window and placed his order.

“Hi, I’ll take three chocolate peanut butter milkshakes please.” Jim says, leaning back from the window and whispering to Pam, “Get a small snack to tide you over, you’ll be cranky if you don’t.” Pam just smiles at him and gives in, moving closer to the order box.

“Can we also get an order of the mozza sticks, and a sma-actually, a medium chicken bits please? Extra sauce?” Pam leaned away from the window and waited for a response.

“Yep, pull on up!” The box responded, exciting Pam for her “small snack”. As they pull up, the cashier opens the window and begins to talk to Jim.

“Hi there, your total is $11.83. Also, we happen to have an extra order of chicken tenders, would you guys like them for free? They’ll just end up in the trash otherwise.” The cashier said, causing Pams eyes to light up.

“Sure! Thanks buddy.” Jim says, taking the food and milkshakes after paying. And with that Jim drove away with a hearty snack for his plump wife to munch on during their drive home. Over the next 20 minutes, Pam ate her mozza sticks, chicken bits, and free large tenders, leaving barely any trace that she ate before their lunch with her mother. Pam released a large belch before leaving the car, rubbing her bloated belly as she exited.

“Thanks for stopping for me, you’re the best.” Pam said, kissing Jim on the cheek as she walked through the front door of her house holding the milkshakes. “Mom, we’re back! We brought you a milkshake!” Pam yelled, putting down the tray of drinks and looking around the living room for her mother and daughter. Just then, Helene was walking down the hallway towards Pam.

“Hey honey, good to see you’re back, I was starting to get hungry. Cece is napping right now. Thanks for the milkshake, I can’t wait to have it!” Helene exclaimed grabbing the cold drink and taking a sip. “Oh my that’s great, this tastes fabulous!” Helene has always been a skinny woman, not usually keen on junk food or fast food, but since her visit to Burger Valley with her daughter, Helene has given food a second chance, especially since it helps with the loneliness since her divorce. Helene ate as a way to relieve stress, which is the reason she’s almost bursting out of the button up she is currently wearing. Helene now weighed 176 pounds, the heaviest shes ever been, even when pregnant. She had a belly that was currently squished enough to show her muffin top and love handles, while also showing the pressure that was being put on her buttons. Helenes top buttons were undone, showing off her larger breasts nicely. Her ass was thicker, but she could still squeeze in jeans for now. Helenes arms were fatter as well, showing her lack of workouts in recent weeks. Her face was rounder and softer, making her appearance kinder than she was before. It was an adjustment for Pam to see her mother overweight, but it was nice that her mother wasn’t hounding her too much about her weight or eating habits, as she was equally guilty. Pam and her mother helped Jim put away their groceries as they discussed their plans for the upcoming week.

“Aren’t you going on vacation this week? I just remember you can’t watch Cece for a bit.” Pam asked her mother.

“Yep! I’m going to an all inclusive resort in the Caribbean on Thursday, I’m going to stay for 2 whole weeks. Can’t wait for the drinks, the buffets, the pool! I will need to upgrade my wardrobe afterwards I can feel it hahaha. Anyways, I’m going with a couple girlfriends who like to relax and get away from the cold. Plus they make me feel skinnier when I’m with them.” Helene jokes as she puts away a couple bags of chips.

“Sounds like fun Helene!” Jim said happily. “I was thinking we should do Burger Valley for lunch? What do you guys think?” Both women's eyes lit up at the mention, both agreeing with intense head nods. “Great, then I’ll start the car.” Jim walked out to the driveway, getting the carseat ready for his daughter. Helene and Pam get Cece ready for lunch.

After the uncomfortable exchange with their boss the morning before, most of the women were trying to work extra hard hoping she was watching, just trying to salvage whatever dignity they could from Jo, although admittedly she hadn’t been very keen on her employees since the morning. Jo had stayed in the conference room since she stormed in there, making Pam, Erin and Phyllis nervous about being so close to her proximity if she started shouting again. Meredith figured she was far enough from Jo’s sightlines that she could chow down freely and hide before she got caught (which was unlikely due to her excess bulk). The most afraid of Jo’s wrath was Erin, which would explain her thoughts of panic when she realized Jo was texting her from the conference room to come see her. Erin was in a panic, worried about her tight clothes, rumbling stomach and chubbier face, she knew she’d cave at any of Jo’s questions. Still, she had no other choice. What’s the worst that can really happen? Erin thought nervously, lifting herself off of her chair and towards the conference room fearing for her life.

As Erin walked up to the door, she slowly opened it fearing for the worst, expecting Jo to fire her for her gluttony, or for her to shame Erin for putting on so much weight in such a short amount of time. Erin held her breath opening the door, but as she walked in she quickly realized something else was going on, something very different than she expected. Erin saw Jo, who was leaned back in her chair, pants unbuttoned and her hand caressing her bloated belly. In front of her, lay the open box she had confiscated with 2 doughnuts still left in it, half a doughnut still in her left hand. Jo’s face had sugar and pastry smothered all over it, while her eyes looked dazed and empty, clearly in a trance from her private pig out session. Erin quickly closed the door after entering, keeping the scene contained from the other employees of the office.

“Ms. Bennet! Oh my goodness how can I assist you?” Erin said wanting to help her boss, worried she was about to be yelled at.

“Oh… my… *burrrppp!* Erin you’re soo-*URP!*.. Sweet! Don’t worry though, that’s not why I texted you to come in here.” Jo said, still leaning back and taking another bite from her half finished doughnut. “Mmm *munch* I just wanted to apologize about earlier, what I said and *urp* did was out of line, I’m very sorry for taking your very delicious doughnuts. As you can tell though, they were clearly delicious though haha…” Jo said, giggling about her current stuffed state. “Now I know I’m the one who got myself into this mess, but I need your help. I figured maybe you and I could work out a deal.” Jo said, smiling mischievously towards Erin.

“I’d love to help boss, let me help in any way I can.” Erin responded, happy to do anything to keep her from being in trouble.

“Excellent! So here’s the thing, before this morning, I didn’t understand what everyone was so late, but after I confiscated your doughnuts, I thought I’d have one for a quick snack. Sure enough, I couldn’t get enough, even as my pants got so tight, I still just kept munching on them.” Jo said, grabbing a doughnut from her box and handing it towards Erin, grabbing the last one for herself. “Look I can’t encourage everyone to eat over work, but I think while I’m here, I should take a look at this cafeteria, see if it’s a business I should get involved in.” Jo took a bite while Erin nibbled slowly, afraid of eating the way she wanted in front of Jo. “So while I’m here, I want you to secretly bring me food to a different room I’ll be working in, one where I’ll be more hidden. I want to try their menu, and in exchange, you can eat everytime I send you down there if you’d like, how’s that sound?” Jo asked, looking greedy and round.

“Oh my that sounds amazing, yes please!” Erin shouted, thinking of the sweets she’ll be eating soon enough. “What can I get for you now?”

“I like your attitude, here’s the deal, I’m here for the next couple of weeks, so I want to try something new everyday unless I request it specifically, okay?” Jo said, doing up her clothes. “I’m gonna leave to that room, I want some fried chicken and if they got mashed potatoes, get me lots of gravy please.” Jo proceeded to exit the room, scaring employees with her stern look. As Jo left, Erin shoved the rest of her doughnut into her mouth, moaning a little as she did.

For the remainder of the morning, Jo went upstairs one floor into a spare office space she rented for secret meetings without Michael. She indeed proceeded to work, but not without something to “snack on”. Up until Lunch came close, Erin would get a text from Jo and be called to grab something she craved, or hoped they’d have. First it was a slice of chocolate cake, some whole milk and some cookies. Erin left her desk, grabbed them, dropped them off to Jo, then went back to her desk. Only 15-20 mins later she’d get another text, only this time asking for pancakes, bacon, eggs, sausages, muffins and biscuits. Erin would then repeat the previous steps, multiple times before lunch even came. This would be great physical exercise for someone who didn’t eat 2 slices of cake as a “treat”, or stuffed a half dozen doughnuts in mere minutes to keep her coworkers unsuspicious of her new deal. Both of the women looked bloated and stuffed, constantly burping yet somehow craving more to eat. While Erin had been eating like this for a while, it seemed unusual that Jo Bennet, a superstar CEO who looked to be unbreakable, was now stuffing her belly full of greasy junk food like the rest of the girls. Jo would continue to eat and eat, looking bloated and fully gorged, but yet somehow still hungry and demanding more. Erin was stunned by how much she ate before lunch, worried her boss might explode. Erin had to ask what was up.

“Hey uh Jo’.” Erin said timidly, entering the secret hideout of Jo’s. Jo was stuffing a bacon melt into her mouth, her face covered in grease. In only 3 hours, Jo ate more food than she would’ve in two days. “I really love your uh, enthusiasm for food, which I definitely share hahahaha-um but uh, I was just wondering why you’re um...eating so much all of sudden…?” Erin was scared, especially with a poor delivery. Jo sat back, swallowing the remnants of her sandwich.

“You know something? That’s a ballsy question.” Jo said with a serious face, shifting her already abundant frame around in her chair. “But I think it takes guts to ask, guts I most definitely have myself. Hahaha!” Jo laughed, grabbing her orb of a belly. “Here’s the deal, okay? I’ve always had a thing for food. Since I was a girl I loved to eat, my daddy had to keep a close eye on me until I was 18, cause I would sneak food any chance I had. I wasn’t this big then, but being wealthy and busy make for a bad diet. Believe it or not, I’ve been pretty good recently. But these damn doughnuts, well girl they’re amazing. And everything since then has been too! This place makes highly delicious and addictive food, and frankly it’s brought my inner fat girl out. Now, since you’re here, could I order my lunch?” Jo said, smiling and relaxing again,

“Oh yeah of course!” Erin said, getting out her notepad, as Jo started listing a large amount of food. Okay, I’ll be back!” Erin said, smiling and walking away, her bigger ass swaying side to side. Not long after, Erin returned with a tray full of food. Nachos, tacos, cake, chicken parm, ravioli, cookies and a burger! “Here you go! Anything else?” Erin said happily.

“No dear, this will do for now. Thank you so much! Go get yourself a bite to eat, don’t worry ‘bout being late either, I’ll let Michael know about your “late lunch””. Jo said smiling, while grabbing the plates in front of her.

“Thanks so much Jo!” Erin said, walking back to the elevator, excited for her own meal.

It’s just after Christmas break, all of the employees are getting used to working 5 days in a row again, most are excited to enjoy the cafeteria food they missed over their days off not because they’d been eating light at home, their addictions and cravings were just calling their stomachs on their first day back. The cafeteria was quite packed on the Monday morning before everyone's shifts had started. Some things had changed rather quickly since Jo discovered food again, causing quite a stir in Scranton and beyond. Jo realized quickly of what kind of potential this cafeteria had at becoming a massive food empire, so she decided to contact their CEO, and with a few more calls Sabre accumulated the company, “Future Foods” as their own. Jo used this ability to eat for free at all their current locations- including “Burger Valley”, but quite frankly she just called her people to make the expansion happen, and quick. Already another restaurant popped up in Scranton, the “Scrantons’, All You Can Eat Anything.” An even larger version of the cafeteria, with more food options as well as larger booths and tables. She gave all Sabre employees a card for 50% off at any Sabre owned location, which of course was quickly utilized by many employees. She also had the cafeteria upgraded again, adding more food options and even a delivery service, which employees could pay a service fee to have a runner drop off food. This was also utilized.

Now, since Jo had gotten mad at the women, they had their guard up about being fired. They all knew how expensive their food addiction would be to feed if they didn’t work there, they all had to keep their jobs. However, eating less was an option that was quickly off the table, so to speak. Another ship that had sailed was using Erin as their own runner. She refused to since getting in trouble, and also vowed to never eat at her desk again. She did keep that promise, but only because of her deal with Jo of being her own personal runner. Erin had still been pigging out, in fact, this new arrangement had Erin eating more food than she ever had before, but thanks to all the moving around for Jo, she actually managed to keep her gain slower, at least compared to other staff members.

Erin had gained a decent amount of weight in such a short amount of time, of course Jo’s orders had kept her trips to the cafeteria frequent, from her new stress eating about keeping her deal secret from the rest of the women, and then how much she managed to gorge on her Christmas break, eating from the new “all you can eat” place or Burger Valley. Erin had been letting herself go majorly, and while she was aware of it she still tried her best to ignore it. Her constant gorging and addiction to sweets places her new weight at 184 pounds. Her boobs were larger than ever, and almost every part of her put on a layer of fat, making her appearance softer with no particular “fat body part” yet. Almost everyone was aware of Erin's weight gain though, watching the skinny and perky secretary thicken right before their eyes. Of course, the same could be said about every other staff member.

While Erin was busy with her task of keeping Jo hidden, she knew she’d still have to make an appearance around the office for the first while, reminding them she was actually still around and watching them. Frankly Jo had no idea what they were even working on, she was lost in her new business venture, but she pretended to care, just to keep them on their feet. This also kept the girls on edge about eating on company time, hiding snacks in all their drawers. Jo knew they were still porking out behind her back, she frankly didn’t care about that, she actually wanted them to want the food more, thinking if she made them do it behind her back they’d eat more at lunch and dinner, hopefully from her restaurants.

It also didn’t take very long for the staff to realize that Joe had been eating just like them, in fact it seemed like she was eating even more. Every time they’d see her she would have food all over her shirt or face, and not to mention she was blowing up like a balloon. She’d be bloated, burping and groaning all over the office, clearly trying to hide it. But Jo’s waistline was the dead giveaway. In a mere 5 week period she grew a rather substantial amount, eating only fattening food at the amount and rate she was would only make a person obese. Jo weighed 265 pounds, sporting her large belly around as she stalked about the office. Jo’s clothes would get incredibly tight before she’d upgrade it, clearly aware of her expanding figure. Still even though she was obviously hooked, they hid all their food just in case.

First was Phyllis’ desk, it was stocked to the brim full of snacks and treats. One drawer was candy bars, another one was filled with doughnuts and other pastries, her largest one filled with 3 large and full bags from Burger Valley. When her food ran out, she’d call for a runner and hope Jo wasn’t coming by at that moment. At work Phyllis was still managing to pack away food like it was her last day alive. She’d show up for breakfast before work, then snack in secret until lunch, which is when she’d gorge herself on two trays worth of food, returning to work bloated and stuffed. Phyllis ate until the end of the day even though she’d feel fit to burst. She’d pick up drive through on the way home and meet her husband, which is when they would have their wild wild sex they love to talk about. This habit over the past 5 weeks has given Phyllis 35 new pounds, putting her at the range for a new scale and past the 400s. She now weighed 413 pounds, and sure was acting like it too. She was always chewing as she worked, munching on something in secret.

Then there’s Meredith, who is now 270 pounds of mostly blubber. Her fat form is very noticeable since she only seems to wear small clothing. Meredith had quite a sizable gut that hung over her waistband in a way she seemed proud of. Meredith looked incredibly fat now, looking like beyond the point of no return, which is probably true. Meredith felt fine hiding burgers, shakes, fries, hotdogs, cakes and more in her desk. She had food hidden all over the office for whenever she needed a snack, which was really all the time now. Meredith also fell in love with her new discount, going out for dinner almost every night now and stuffing her belly full beyond belief.

Kelly couldn’t stop herself if she tried, hiding food all over the annex so she’d never be hungry again. The fear of being unable to eat terrified her, so she made sure there were always snacks nearby for her to devour. At 365 pounds she was a force to be reckoned with, making Gabe too afraid to confront her about her eating. Kelly was massive, bursting from her uniform and jiggling with every movement. Kelly looked as if she couldn’t stop even if she had no other choice.

Then of course, there’s Pam who we know as quite a hardcore snacker herself. These past few weeks were stressful trying to not get caught by Jo. Sometimes Jim would go for her, fetching a large order to fill up her own desk which he also donated desk space to her treats. Not to mention she would go out for dinner almost every other night now, giving into her addiction like the rest. Pam very well knew she was gaining an alarming amount of weight, which she also knew she’d start really feeling the physical effects even stronger as she grows larger and larger. Already Pam feels her breathing has gotten worse, and she sweats more than ever. Pam knew her abundant form was getting out of control, but how exactly is she supposed to stop eating with all of these bad influences around her? These thoughts circulated around Pams head for the past few weeks, only making her clothes feel tighter and tighter. Pam was growing fast tipping the scales at 262 pounds, incredibly close to a new weight gain. Pams fat body pushed on her chair hard, and she looked to be outgrowing clothes almost every other week. Even Jim had put on weight, nothing major, but enough to show his new belly.

In fact, all the guys had put on some weight. Oscar was fatter than before, while Gabe quickly put on some weight too. And then there was petite Angela. At least everyone is on the same page though, almost everyone has put on weight, hell I’m not even the worst of the bunch!”

I never thought I’d be so lost to food.” Pam said in agreement, clutching her jelly belly with one hand while still taking another bite of her pie. “It seems like everyone has lost it, I honestly still can’t believe it sometimes. “Of course, I was worried at first in all honesty, but this food changed my mind. Pam had to admit it to herself, she was slowly coming to terms with her new pounds and while she still wasn't the biggest fan of them but she had to admit that she like the way that Jim touched her and felt towards her recently, not to mention she enjoyed Jims new dad-bod while they were cuddling in bed.

1412113132211231111211.title: Kelly Walks In

Pastries and boxes of cookies and other sweets were on her dresser, and a carton of ice cream was sitting on the floor with a spoon in it. Damn, I can’t believe I kept going after those chicken wings. They were so tasty but dang I was full. Kelly looked down at her body and examined the damage that was caused from last night's bender. For breakfast Kelly would often eat food of many types of varieties to satisfy her many cravings, anything that was greasy, savoury or just simply delicious would do for her. She needed to eat, sooner rather than later. There was no time to get dressed up to go out, she needed to order from all of her favourite restaurants as soon as possible to quiet her growling gut. Kelly ordered eggs, bacon, pancakes, waffles, french toast, sausages, and an abundance of different types of meat and cheese spread out over various omelettes and sandwiches. After a bit of time, her door bell began to ring nonstop, a different delivery driver with different food each trip to the door. After a few minutes of setting up the rest of the food she hadn’t already started eating. Kelly had a feast for the making in front of her face, and she was ready to devour all of it. Bring it on. She was taking up half of the couch, her wide ass squishing under the fat of her upper body. My god I’m taking up so much room on this couch. Oh well, I need something to eat! Let’s get creative here!

Kelly picked up a few sausage links with her fat fingers and put them into the middle of one of her pancakes, which she then rolled up after drenching it in maple syrup. Kelly took a large bite from her unhealthy snack, dripping the syrup down onto her jiggly and large breasts, trailing down to her fat belly button. She moaned with pleasure after each bite, stuffing the food faster and faster into her mouth with each bite. Kelly continued to stuff pancakes, waffles, french toast and bacon into her mouth, spilling food into her cleavage and staining her barely fitting bra. "My god all this food is just… *Burp!* Oh my, it’s just too good. I’m such an *BELCH* an addict. I’m so fat, I can’t stop eating so much *BELCH* I’m going to be unable to move if I don’t stop soon…" Kelly said to herself while belching, chewing and moaning with pleasure with each bite, rubbing her stomach and continuing to eat more junk food.

Eventually, Kelly was left sitting on the couch surrounded by empty trays and plates from all of her favourite breakfast places. Her stomach gurgled from how full and bloated it was. Kelly was glued to her love seat for the next hour thanks to all the food that she had just inhaled, barely able to move her body an inch. That was a delicious start to the day… *hic* … My head feels better, this is the friggin life. I need to rest that off before I do anything for a while. Maybe I’ll just close my eyes for a second… Kelly Fell asleep quickly, her large stomach rising up and down with each breath.

After an hour passed, Kelly eventually wakes up and looks around her, spotting a large pile of dishes with food scraps and garbage littered around the room. That was a great breakfast, I’m still pretty full. Maybe I should watch some TV for a bit. Kelly thinks, putting on her favourite channel. After a few minutes, Kelly felt the dryness of her mouth and decided she needed a drink, so with some effort, she lifted her fat body off of her couch and walked towards the refrigerator. All you can eat! This weekend only!” The TV said, showing the food in slow motion on the screen, causing Kelly to drool and caress her gut. I am getting hungry again… I could be down for some lunch. 14121131322112311112111.title: Kellys Saturday

141211313221123111121111.content:
After getting dressed and heading out into the world, Kelly arrived at Burger Valley. The place was very busy because of the limited time promotion, making Kelly wait a few minutes for a table to open up. While Kelly sat at a booth at the front, she watched the patrons of the restaurant as they walked past her, until noticing that one of them was in fact her former co-worker, Karen Filippelli. Karen was walking with a couple other people, looking like they were on a business lunch. Maybe there’s a conference in town this weekend? Kelly thought, wondering what they were doing in Scranton. As Karen began to walk past Kelly she saw Karen's slight belly jiggling as she walked, her love handles sitting over her tight pants. Karen's butt was a tad bigger as well, making her quite the hit with any men around. Compared to so many, Karen had barely put on any real weight. She looked hotter, thicker, and ultimately healthier, pulling off her new weight very well. Before Karen could leave, Kelly called out her name.

“Karen? Karen Filippelli?” Karen stopped quickly and turned around, unsure who was calling her name. “Over here, it’s me, Kelly Kapoor! From Dunder Mifflin!” Kelly said, waving her fat, meaty arm in the air to get Karen's attention. Karen's gaze turned onto Kelly finally, and her eyes widened quickly. It was a miracle her jaw didn’t physically drop from the shear surprise of seeing Kelly Kapoor 3 times the size she used to be. Karen walked over, unsure of how to approach the literal elephant in the room.

“Hey there, Kelly. How’s it going?” Karen asked politely, trying to keep a straight face.

“Very well! About to get some mighty fine lunch, did you just get some?” Kelly asked smiling, looking almost oblivious to her humongous weight gain to Karen. How in the hell does someone gain so much weight so quickly? She used to be so skinny! Karen thought to herself, still taking in the size of Kelly.

“Yeah actually… we did.” Karen said, trying to play it cool. “Last time I came down for a meeting I was told about this place and I really enjoyed it, and since there is another meeting this weekend in Scranton, I thought I’d treat the staff. Show them what I was talking about” Karen had an itch to eat at Burger Valley any time she was in Scranton, which was becoming more and more frequent (in secret of course). Karen was an addict like the other girls, however she didn’t have the luxury of having it readily available like they did in Scranton.

“That’s neat! Why are there so many meetings here? I didn’t think that we really had anything.” Kelly asked, confused.

“That’s true, but you guys have the beginning of sabres new massive fast food chain. I’m here to see how they are and let the bosses know if we want one in our cafeteria. I’m thinking we do, it’s damn tasty.” Karen said. “Although it’s not the healthiest stuff I suppose.” Karen froze. Why did I just say that? Oh she’s gonna call me on it, Karen feared.

“Ha tell me about it, I’m a blimp since trying all this new food.” Kelly said with a smile, slapping her gut and laughing.

“Oh it’s only a few pounds Kelly, you look great, honestly, I really couldn’t even-” Karen started, before Kelly interrupted her.

“I’m huge, I know it, you don’t have to pretend don’t worry ha ha. But I don’t know if I can stop eating, I’m so hooked on all of it. It’s been incredibly challenging keeping myself from blowing up so much, but I can’t control myself. Will say it is definitely a fun time to just eat whatever you want, whenever you want.” Kelly said. “It’s tough to explain, but there’s a new found freedom in this. I used to be so mean, and opinionistic on unimportant topics. I think I’m a better person since discovering this hobby And I’m not ashamed of my body, it is what it is at this point.” Karen was surprised by the answer, not really being able to understand what it’d be like coming to terms with being almost 400 pounds.

“Well, that’s a good attitude to have, at least enjoy it. I like that.” Karen responded. “Maybe I’ll ask for some extra features for our cafeteria too, since I should at least enjoy it a little bit right?” Karen said with a smile, causing Kelly to laugh.

“Definitely, get them a milkshake machine!” Kelly said enthusiastically. As they both laughed, Karen said goodbye and told Kelly she’d be in touch. Karen didn’t imagine herself getting out of that situation so smoothly, pleasantly surprised by Kellys attitude. Maybe I should let loose a little bit too, I just gotta be slimmer than her, which shouldn’t be hard. I mean how could I really lose that much self control? Kelly snickered in her head as she walked to her car. As Karen was getting out of the parking lot, it was around the time that Kelly was brought to her table, finally picking up her menu.

Meredith said slapping her belly for emphasis. Erin looked flabbergasted, while Andy pretended to not be extremely aroused. "I eat food on camera and more. I make really good money, I'm only starting too, I see a lot more on its way. All I gotta do is grow and eat, how lucky am I?" Meredith laughed. Andy thought about it for a moment before responding.

"Well Meredith, whatever you do on your own time is up to you, but no more doing it at work okay? I don't want you to get fired for that." Andy said.

"Sounds good, I'll keep it at home. But I'm serious, if you two are ever interested-" Meredith started, before they both told her to stop. "Whatever, more for me." She laughed, walking out the door. Andy couldn't believe what just happened. My life is becoming more and more like a dream. He thought to himself. Nothing can go wrong, my life is only getting better… Just then Robert California walked into the office and approached Andy.

"Andy, just the man I wanted to see!" He said cheerfully.

"Robert, what brings you in today?" Andy said, feeling like he is in cloud nine.

"Might I talk with you in your office?" Robert said, gesturing towards the office. They both walked in while Robert closed the door behind him. Andy stood behind his desk and waited for Robert to start talking. "Andy I like to be blunt, so I'll get right to it. I'm having you demoted from your position as manager immediately. I'm having you moved back to sales to fill that empty spot." Robert said, Andy's smile washed away from hearing this.
